name: figmagic
description: Automate the generation of design tokens and specs from your Figma documents. Inspired by Salesforce Theo.
author: Mikael Vesavuori

scripts.setup: rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf /node_modules && rm -rf /usr/local/lib/node_modules/figmagic && npm install -g
scripts.precommit: echo Running pre-commit linting... && pretty-quick --staged && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json
